DOC.brief_summary: Patients with diabetes mellitus and definite autonomic and peripheral neuropathy were randomized to receive quinapril or no treatment for 2 years.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Administration of ACE-Inhibition on Autonomic and Peripheral Neuropathy in Patients With Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Diabetes mellitus with both autonomic and peripheral neuropathy Hypertension, coronary heart disease
